page.title: 08 PARSONS GREEN COMMON
page.content: The Common is roughly triangular in shape with several walk-ways criss-cross, so that people walk across the Green rather than follow the footpaths that skirt it. Local people walk almost every type of dog there, local workers crowd onto it during their lunch breaks on summer days to eat cut lunches, to sunbathe or merely to sit and doze on the seats.Surrounding the park there are a number of attractive large houses,one block of two storey flats,a large church of England school set in attractive gardens next to a social services unit.There is a very popular pub with a large patio;on summer evening the patio and pavements are crowded with young people who gather to chat and enjoy the social atmosphere.
